dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare approach the Quartzite Colossus. State your purpose, insignificant creature.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I only seek passage, mighty Colossus.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your words are hollow. The Colossus cares not for your requests.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then I shall turn back, no harm meant.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Weakness detected. The Colossus finds you unworthy and insignificant. Prepare for your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for the intrusion, I shall leave immediately.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The Colossus acknowledges your submission. Depart and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking knowledge and wisdom, great Colossus.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is power, but you lack the capacity to comprehend what the Colossus holds.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am humble, but eager to learn. Please share your wisdom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ignorance is potent in you. The Colossus will not waste its knowledge on the feeble-minded.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand, I shall depart and seek knowledge elsewhere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The decision is wise. Begone from these grounds with what little knowledge you possess.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you, Quartzite Colossus. Prepare to face my strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal. Your arrogance blinds you to the consequences of provoking the Colossus.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am no match for your might, I retract my challenge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Retreat acknowledged. The Colossus allows your cowardice to spare your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no stone giant. Let our battle commence!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your bravery is amusing. The Colossus shall crush you with ease.
